member.name: M:Saltarelle.IFragment.TryMergeWithNext(Saltarelle.IFragment)
member.summary: Try to merge this frament with the next one
member.returns: A new fragment if the merge was successful, null if the fragments couldn't be merged

member.param: The template which is being rendered.
